alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Pontotoc; Prentiss; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 9:27PM CDT until March 24 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Northern Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... Northern Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... Southwestern Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 926 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ecru, or near Pontotoc, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Pontotoc, Baldwyn, Trace State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Mantachie, Ecru, New Harmony, Pratts Friendship, Blair, Sherman, Thaxton, Marietta, Blue Springs, Hortontown, Esperanza, Endville, Cherry Creek and Branyan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
